prestige_SelfRez.help: If you are defeated, you may return to battle empowered by the effects of several types of large inspirations! After each use, you may not use this effect again for another hour.
prestige_SelfRez.shortHelp: Self Rez, Debt Protection, +Large Inspiration Effects
prestige_SelfRez.attackerHit: You return to battle, ready for anything.

Renewal_of_Light.help: A guardian spirit watches over you. If you are defeated, activating this power will restore you so you may continue the battle. The restoration blasts nearby foes with an explosion, knocking them down and Disorienting them. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. You will be invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Renewal_of_Light.targetHelp: You are renewed. You are untouchable for 15 seconds and are protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.

prestige_InspirationGrant.help: You can look deep within yourself to find the inspiration necessary to overcome any obstacle. Using this power will award the player with 3 inspirations. Once used, you will be prevented from using this power again for 30 minutes.

prestige_Permanent_SelfDestruction.help: You explode! In doing so, you create a massive explosion which deals extreme damage to all foes in a large radius. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
prestige_Permanent_SelfDestruction.shortHelp: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing/Fire), Foe KB, Self Kill

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage over time.

Mystic_Fortune.help: You can read the fortune of any player. This grants a random permanent buff for 20 minutes, and they may not have their fortune read again during that time.
Mystic_Fortune.confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to read your fortune. Do you Accept?

Secondary_Mutation.help: You acquire a secondary mutation. This grants a random permanent buff for up to 20 minutes. No more than one Secondary Mutation can be in place at a time.

prestige_reveal.help: Your extensive knowledge of your surroundings will allow you to clear the "Fog of War" from any map once every 5 minutes.

Shadowy_Presence.help: Activating this power shifts you into a semi-real shadow-state. So long as you are not attacked and remain motionless, you will have extremely good stealth rating and be nearly invisible. This power has a long, interruptible cast time and always takes 5 minutes to recharge. This power provides no benefit in PvP or in PvP zones.
Shadowy_Presence.victimHit: You activate {PowerName} and become difficult to detect.

Portable_Workbench.help: You can use this power to summon a Portable Workbench, which will allow anyone nearby to craft recipes. The Portable Workbench lasts 5 minutes when summoned and can be summoned every 5 minutes. You may not summon the Portable Workbench in PvP enabled areas.
